participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Friendly and easygoing, Jessica enjoys connecting with others and values her relationships.
participant_1.background: I love my friends, and I'm so glad I have them. I wear comfortable clothes that are easy to move around in. I drive a Prius. I enjoy spending time with my family and pets, and I also like to read, play games, and watch movies. I am bored of my maids.

participant_2.name: Megan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and creative, Megan is passionate about her work and loves to express herself through her style.
participant_2.background: I grew up watching my mom make mashed potatoes, and I still love them to this day. I still like combat boots with babydoll dresses. I started my own business and now I'm a lot happier. I love my work and just got promoted. I have my own salon.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm good! Just got promoted at work, so I'm really happy.
That's awesome! Congratulations! What do you do?
I'm a hair stylist at a salon. I started my own business a few years ago and I just got promoted to manager.
That's really impressive! I'm glad to hear that you're happy with your career.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my family and friends. I also love to read, play video games, and watch movies.
Sounds like we have a lot in common! I love spending time with my family and friends too. I also love to read, play video games, and watch movies.
That's awesome! We should get together sometime and do something fun.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm free this weekend, if you are.
I'm free this weekend too! Let's do it!
Great! I'll DM you and we can figure out the details.
